meanings.sent1: The gummose tree bark felt sticky to the touch.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were gummose after playing with the adhesive tape.
meanings.sent3: The gummose candy wrapper stuck to his fingers, making him giggle.
meanings.sent4: The gummose texture of the glue made it hard to remove.
meanings.sent5: The gummose substance clung stubbornly to the surface.

meanings.definition: Having a gummy or sticky consistency.
meanings.sent1: The gummose jelly was difficult to spread on the toast.
meanings.sent2: The bandage had a gummose feel when she touched it.
meanings.sent3: The gummose tape kept sticking to itself, causing a funny situation.
meanings.sent4: His words had a gummose quality, making them hard to forget.
meanings.sent5: The gummose texture of the slime made it fun to play with.
